DOC.brief_summary: Stress urinary incontinence ( SUI ) health concern many woman . The transvaginal tape ( TVT ) surgery become common procedure address problem . Another surgery available , trans-obturator tape ( TOT ) . The investigator compare 2 approach deal SUI follow woman 1 year . Women also follow 5 year surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Trans-Obturator Tape Versus Trans-Vaginal Tape Stress Urinary Incontinence Women
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize trial woman stress incontinence allocate receive either TOT TVT procedure . Women elect surgical management type II stress incontinence eligible participate trial . Baseline data , include patient questionnaire , collect . Hospital outcome , include length stay surgical complication document hospital chart . All woman attend 6-week follow-up visit standard care : structure data collection form use surgeon collect information another patient questionnaire administer . At 12 month postoperatively woman attend clinic objective measurement incontinence , full exam complete questionnaire . The main outcome effectiveness procedure determine use 1-hour pad test . Secondary research question include : How effective TOT compare TVT term : Subjective cure 12 month postoperatively ? Incontinence-specific quality life 6 week 12 month postoperatively ? Satisfaction surgery 12 month postoperatively ? Return usual activity usual sex life surgery ? The prevalence void dysfunction 12 month postoperatively ? Surgical complication , short term long term ? Utility cost ? ( economic evaluation ) The study carry accord ICH Good Clinical Practice Guidelines . At 5 year postoperatively woman attend clinic follow-up . The primary research question 5-year follow-up : Safety - What incidence vaginal erosion serious adverse outcome surgery among woman surgical procedure stress urinary incontinence utilize TOT device , versus TVT device , 5 year follow surgery ? Secondary question follow : Effectiveness - What objective subjective outcome TOT compare TVT 5 year follow surgery SUI ? Health economics - What disease-specific rate health service utilization relate repeat surgical intervention , well surgery treatment related adverse event woman TOT procedure , versus TVT procedure , 5 year surgery ? Using economic modelling cost utility analysis , TOT cost-effective compare TVT 5 year surgery ? Other question : Do woman tape find palpable vagina 12 month postoperatively , go develop vaginal erosion 5 year follow surgery ?
